name: NSFileProviderManager
desc: A manager object that you use to communicate with the file provider from either your app or your File Provider extension.

items.name: default
items.desc: Returns the shared file provider manager object; you can access this object in both the containing app and the File Provider extension.

items.name: documentStorageURL
items.desc: The root URL for all shared documents.

items.name: providerIdentifier
items.desc: A purpose identifier for coordinated reads and writes.

items.name: placeholderURL
items.desc: Returns a placeholder URL for a given document URL.

items.name: writePlaceholder
items.desc: Writes a document placeholder with the provided metadata.
